name: Kevin Sallée
title: Senior Software Engineer
summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 18 years of comprehensive experience specializing in full-stack development and pipeline architecture. Expert in Python development with proven success in building complex systems across multiple domains.

Led VFX pipeline development at major studios, scaling teams from 5 to 18 developers and architecting high-performance solutions. Extensive experience in studio pipeline development, including work at Cinesite, Rodeo FX, and Animal Logic.

Technical expertise spans modern web technologies (FastAPI, Django, React, Svelte), DevOps practices (Docker, CI/CD, AWS), and UI development (Qt, Flutter). Strong background in cross-platform application development, real-time 3D graphics pipelines, and enterprise-grade database architecture.

Currently focusing on Python for enterprise solutions while driving innovation with Svelte for modern web applications, with recent projects including offline-first PWAs and real-time monitoring systems.
